QuestData.Title: What's Your Specialty?
QuestData.Description:
Hey, $n! Have you decided on a combat specialization yet?
Since you're a $c, you already know about the different classes available to adventurers. But did you know that there are also areas of specialization within each class?
Choosing a specialization is an important decision. Your specialty determines your combat role in a party, as well as the kinds of weapons and abilities that you will use.
Let's go speak with Avaros Dawnglaive to learn more about specializations!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Avaros Dawnglaive to learn about combat specializations.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Avaros Dawnglaive to learn about specializations
